name: terminal-config
description: Handle's terminal configuration, opens terminals and runs commands (based on setting's set in user preferenaces

terminal-config.description: The configuration for the terminal to open

name.description: Name of the profile can be used for new configurations

commands.description: The command(s) to run in the terminal

profile.description: Profile you want this tmerinal to use

commands.description: The command(s) to run in the terminal

path.description: The path to run the command in (defaults to the current workspace folder)

autoClose.description: If the terminal should be closed after the command has been run

autoCloseDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the terminal is closed

alwaysCreateTerminal.description: If the terminal should always be created, even if it already exists

dontCreateTerminal.description: Do not create a terminal for this workspace

show.description: If the terminal should be shown after it has been created

keybindTerminal.description: The name of the terminal to use for keybinds (defaults to the first terminal created)

createTerminalForKeybindsIfNoTerminal.description: If a new terminal should be created if there is no terminal for the keybind event

[1-9].description: ctrl+shift+[1-9] will do a command to the currently showing terminal (Note global keybinds don't run if workspace/folders have keybinds.)

commands.description: The command(s) to run in the terminal

actions.description: The action(s) to run in the terminal

enumDescriptions: Sets the keybind terminal to the currently showing terminal

additionalTerminals.description: Additional terminals to open after the first terminal has been opened

name.description: The name of the terminal to open

profile.description: Profile you want this tmerinal to use

commands.description: The command(s) to run in the terminal

path.description: The path to run the command in (defaults to the current workspace folder)

autoClose.description: If the terminal should be closed after the command has been run

autoCloseDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the terminal is closed

alwaysCreateTerminal.description: If the terminal should always be created, even if it already exists

show.description: If the terminal should be shown after it has been created

split.description: If the terminal should be split from the first terminal

alwaysCreateTerminal.description: If the terminal should always be created, even if it already exists

show.description: If the terminal should be shown after it has been created

split.description: If the terminal should be split from the first terminal

initialLoadDelay.description: The time in seconds to wait before initattializing the extension.

delayAfterRemovingTerminals.description: The time in seconds to wait before initattializing the extension.

ignoreRegex.description: Calls RegExp(ignoreRegex, 'g') on the path to determine if the terminal should be created

createTerminalForKeybindsIfNoTerminal.description: If a new terminal should be created if there is no terminal for the keybind event

fileToFind.description: The file to find in the workspace(s) to determine if it needs a terminal opened

addNewTerminalToWorkspace.description: Adds a new workspace to your workspace configuration when a new workspace is found.

removeTerminalsOnLoad.description: Removes all previous terminals when workspace is loaded (Global)

removeSameNameTerminals.description: Removes all previous terminals with the same name when workspace is loaded (Global)

useDefaultProfileOnNewProjects.description: Set to false, if you don't want new projects to get entires in your global user preferenaces
